actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to authorize reduced fare transportation on airlines, railroads, vessels, and buses for persons who have attained the age of 65.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to authorize reduced air fares on a space-available basis to individuals 65 years of age or older. Amends the Interstate Commerce Act to authorize common carriers subject to such Act to offer reduced fares on a space-available basis for such individuals.

titles.title: A bill to authorize reduced fare transportation on airlines, railroads, vessels, and buses for persons who have attained the age of 65.
